thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Stephanie Walczak Weber
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Stephanie Walczak Weber

author: Stephanie Walczak Weber
title: Stephanie Walczak Weber
text: Anastasia at CRV is hands down the best travel agent we've ever used. I have referred numerous people to her and all feedback is the same...Absolutely fabulous! Each vacation is tailored to the types of experiences and budgets brought to the table by the traveler. There is a contact number in case something goes wrong. We've only had to use it once, and our issue was taken care of in moments with no hassle. Anastasia has something for everyone and CRV's customer service is top notch!
